item.description:
Join us for our next ethnic dining experience with an entertaining twist!  Every Friday night there is live music and belly dancing starting at 8:30 pm, so a 7 pm dinner should be perfect for enjoying the excitement.

 

Maurice Daaboul and family’s Byblos is the Boston area’s premier eatery since 1996 for authentic, homemade Lebanese cuisine. Located in the heart of Norwood, Massachusetts, Byblos offers all the best features of Lebanese dining, including a large hall where feasts are laid out in traditional Lebanese Maza style to the tune of live Arabic music and oriental belly dancing. At Byblos they pride themselves on bringing freshness, authenticity and service to their valued customers.


Byblos got its name from an ancient Phoenician port city in Lebanon where part of their family resided. In 2002, in order to better serve their valued customers, Byblos relocated from its small, popular eatery to its current location in central Norwood.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Friday Night Dinner and Entertainment

Friday June 29th @ 7pm

Byblos Restaurant

678 Washington St

Norwood, MA 02062

(781) 278-0000

Website: http://www.byblosrestaurant.com

Link to dinner menu PDF: http://www.byblosrestaurant.com/news/files/menu-byblos-restaurant.pdf

Meeting Place: Please meet inside the front door.

 

Organizers: Alison and Jeanne

Event Fee: [Current] Annual Members - FREE, Members and guests- $2 each; $6 to become a 2012 Annual Member.

Min/max: No minimum. Alison and Jeanne will dine by themselves if need. The max is set at 12 people.

Guests: 1 per member

RSVP Deadline: 9 pm on Thursday, June 28th to finalize our reservations.

No show policy in our membership Information Page: (Please click on the following link to be taken directly to the page.)

http://www.meetup.com/ssdomg/pages/Membership_Information/

Please bring cash. You are responsible for your portion of the bill including drinks, food, shared food, tax, and tip.  This has been the SSDOMG's policy for over 5 years now and it helps avoid confusion when paying the bill.

Inclement Weather: This event takes place rain or shine.  In the case of an extreme weather forecast we will update this information at least 24 hours prior to the event.

Please see the Pages for more information about the SSDOMG's policies and procedures which help ensure a smoother, relaxed, fun dining experience for everyone.

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 

Directions: Byblos is on Washington St. in Norwood Center.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet inside the front door or at our table after we are seated.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Join us for dinner and entertainment at Byblos in Norwood!
